alert.note: Alert for Acadia; Jefferson Davis; Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 30 at 2:30PM CST until further notice by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana...Texas... Bayou Des Cannes Near Eunice Bayou Anacoco Near Rosepine Calcasieu River near White Oak Park Calcasieu River Near Glenmora Calcasieu River Near Salt Water Barrier Sabine River Near Deweyville ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana...Texas... Mermentau River Near Mermentau Pine Island Bayou Near Sour Lake Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE SATURDAY NIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mermentau River Near Mermentau. * WHEN...From late Saturday night until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 4.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding near the river will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:15 PM CST Friday the stage was 3.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Sunday morning and continue rising to a crest of 4.1 feet early Monday morning. - Flood stage is 4.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Mermentau River Mermentau 4.0 3.6 Fri 2 pm CST 3.9 4.0 4.1 &&
